column1: Visitation will be from 4 to 8 p.m. Monday
column4: at Eastside Bible Church in Morton. Further visitation will be from 9 to 9:45 a.m. Tuesday
column7: followed by a funeral service at 10 a.m.
column8: with Pastor Jason Ogle officiating. Burial will be in Hillcrest Memory Gardens in Morton.
